title: karuNai mukhil
sahitya:
karuNai mukhil garjittiDa varuNapriyai varugavE


anupallavi

  aruNat-tiru vazhagup-payir aruLAl viLaivEravE


caraNam    vanamAmalar maNamADiDa malaiyArugaL ADa 
manamAmayil magizhndADiDa ina mAmayiluDanE
tana tAnana tana tandana taka takudhimi takajham ena
enadAruyir naTamADiDa iraivan pugazh pADi
